IVotingPowerRegistry","name":"","type":"address"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"details":"Extends Gardens V2's BaseStrategyUpgradeable and reuses ConvictionsUtils      for alpha-decay conviction math:        conviction(t) = \u03b1^t \u00b7 y\u2080 + x \u00b7 (1 - \u03b1^t) / (1 - \u03b1)      where \u03b1 = decay / D, t = blocks elapsed, y\u2080 = previous conviction, x Does not erase conviction data \u2014 just marks inactive.      Existing stakes remain but no new support can be allocated.","params":{"_hypercertId":"The hypercert token ID to deregister"}},"getAllo()":{"returns":{"_0":"The Allo contract"}},"getConvictionWeights()":{"details":"Primary read target for the Octant vault strategy.      Returns real-time conviction (applies decay since last on-chain update).","returns":{"hypercertIds":"Array of active hypercert IDs","weights":"Array of corresponding conviction weights"}},"getPoolAmount()":{"returns":{"_0":"Always 0"}},"getPoolId()":{"returns":{"_0":"The ID of the pool"}},"getVoterAllocations(address)":{"params":{"_voter":"The voter address"},"returns":{"amounts":"Array of corresponding staked amounts","hypercertIds":"Array of hypercert IDs with non-zero stakes"}},"init(address,address)":{"params":{"_allo":"Address of the Allo contract","_owner":"Address of the strategy owner"}},"init(address,string,address)":{"params":{"_allo":"Address of the Allo contract.","_name":"Name of the strategy","_owner":"Address of the owner of the strategy"}},"initialize(uint256,bytes)":{"params":{"_data":"ABI-encoded HypercertSignalPoolInitializeParams","_poolId":"The Allo pool ID"}},"isEligibleVoter(address)":{"params":{"_account":"The address to check"},"returns":{"_0":"True if the address is a member of the registry community"}},"isPoolActive()":{"returns":{"_0":"'true' if the pool is active, otherwise 'false'"}},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"proxiableUUID()":{"details":"Implementation of the ERC1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier."},"reclaimStakes(uint256[])":{"details":"Frees the voter's budget by zeroing stakes on inactive hypercerts.      Also decrements stakedAmounts to keep data consistent.","params":{"_hypercertIds":"Array of deregistered hypercert IDs to reclaim from"}},"registerRecipient(bytes,address)":{"details":"Operator-only. Data encodes: abi.encode(uint256 hypercertId)","params":{"_data":"ABI-encoded hypercert token ID","_sender":"The operator/pool manager address"},"returns":{"recipientId":"Address derived from hypercertId (Allo compatibility)"}},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"setDecay(uint256)":{"params":{"_decay":"New decay value (must be > 0 and < D)"}},"setPointsPerVoter(uint256)":{"params":{"_pointsPerVoter":"New points per voter value (must be > 0)"}},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). points used by each voter across all hypercerts"},"votingPowerRegistry()":{"notice":"Voting power registry for member eligibility checks"}},"notice":"Allo v2 signal-only pool for conviction voting on hypercert fractions.         Gardeners allocate conviction to operator-curated hypercerts.         The pool is a read-only oracle \u2014 the Octant vault strategy reads         conviction weights via getConvictionWeights() and independently         buys fractions. distribute() is a no-op.","version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"pkg/contracts/src/HypercertSignalPool/HypercertSignalPool.sol":"HypercertSignalPool"},"evmVersion":"shanghai","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"none"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":0},"remappings":[":@gnosis.pm/safe-contracts/=lib/octant-v2-core/dependencies/safe-global-safe-smart-account-1.4.1-3/",":@openzeppelin/contracts-upgradeable/=lib/openzeppelin-contracts-upgradeable/contracts/",":@openzeppelin/contracts/=lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/",":@openzeppelin/foundry/=lib/openzeppelin-foundry-upgrades/src/",":@prb/math/=lib/allo-v2/lib/v2-core/lib/prb-math/",":@prb/test/=lib/allo-v2/lib/v2-core/lib/prb-test/src/",":@sablier/v2-core/=lib/allo-v2/lib/v2-core/",":@src/=pkg/contracts/src/",":@superfluid-finance/=lib/protocol-monorepo/packages/",":@tokenized-strategy-periphery/=lib/octant-v2-core/dependencies/tokenized-strategy-periphery-3.0.2/src/",":ERC1155/=lib/allo-v2/lib/hats-protocol/lib/ERC1155/",":__safe-smart-account/=lib/__safe-smart-account/",":abdk-libraries-solidity/=lib/octant-v2-core/dependencies/abdk-libraries-solidity-3.2/",":allo-v2-contracts/=lib/allo-v2/contracts/",":allo-v2-test/=lib/allo-v2/test/",":allo-v2/=lib/allo-v2/",":ds-test/=lib/allo-v2/lib/forge-std/lib/ds-test/src/",":eas-contracts/=lib/allo-v2/lib/eas-contracts/contracts/",":eas-proxy/=lib/allo-v2/lib/eas-proxy/contracts/",":erc4626-tests/=lib/octant-v2-core/dependencies/erc4626-tests-0.0.0/",":forge-gas-snapshot/=lib/allo-v2/lib/permit2/lib/forge-gas-snapshot/src/",":forge-std/=lib/forge-std/src/",":hats-protocol/=lib/allo-v2/lib/hats-protocol/",":hedgey-vesting/=lib/allo-v2/lib/hedgey-vesting/contracts/",":kontrol-cheatcodes/=lib/octant-v2-core/dependencies/kontrol-cheatcodes-v0.0.1/",":lib/ERC1155/=lib/octant-v2-core/dependencies/hats-protocol-1.0/lib/ERC1155/",":octant-v2-core/=lib/octant-v2-core/src/",":openzeppelin-contracts-upgradeable/=lib/openzeppelin-contracts-upgradeable/",":openzeppelin-contracts/=li allocate(bytes,address).details: Voter must be a member of the registry community.      Data encodes: abi.encode(HypercertSignal[])

deregisterHypercert(uint256).details: Operator-only. Does not erase conviction data  just marks inactive.      Existing stakes remain but no new support can be allocated.

params._hypercertId: The hypercert token ID to deregister

getConvictionWeights().details: Primary read target for the Octant vault strategy.      Returns real-time conviction (applies decay since last on-chain update).

returns.hypercertIds: Array of hypercert IDs with non-zero stakes

params._owner: Address of the owner of the strategy

returns._0: True if the address is a member of the registry community
'true' if the pool is active, otherwise 'false'

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

reclaimStakes(uint256[]).details: Frees the voter's budget by zeroing stakes on inactive hypercerts.      Also decrements stakedAmounts to keep data consistent.

params._hypercertIds: Array of deregistered hypercert IDs to reclaim from

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._decay: New decay value (must be > 0 and < D)

params._pointsPerVoter: New points per voter value (must be > 0)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

upgradeTo(address).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

D().notice: Precision denominator for decay (10^7), matching ConvictionsUtils.D

activeHypercertCount().notice: Get the count of active hypercerts.

blockLast(uint256).notice: Block number of last conviction update per hypercert

calculateConviction(uint256).notice: Get real-time conviction for a hypercert, applying decay since last update.

decay().notice: Conviction decay parameter (alpha * D where D = 10^7)

deregisterHypercert(uint256).notice: Deregister a hypercert from the signal pool.

distribute(address[],bytes,address).notice: No-op. This is a signal pool  distribution is handled by the vault.

getConvictionWeights().notice: Get all conviction weights for active hypercerts.

getRegisteredHypercerts().notice: Get all registered hypercert IDs (including inactive).

getVoterAllocations(address).notice: Get a voter's support allocations across all hypercerts.

hypercertActive(uint256).notice: Active status per hypercert (false = deregistered by operator)

init(address,address).notice: Proxy initializer  called once on deployment.

init(address,string,address).notice: Constructor to set the Allo contract and "strategyId'.`init` here its the initialize for upgradable contracts, different from `initialize()` that its used for Allo

initialize(uint256,bytes).notice: Pool initializer  called by Allo when pool is created.

isEligibleVoter(address).notice: Check if an address is an eligible voter.

isPoolActive().notice: Getter for whether or not the pool is active.

reclaimStakes(uint256[]).notice: Reclaim support points stranded on deregistered hypercerts.

registerRecipient(bytes,address).notice: Register a hypercert as eligible for conviction signaling.

stakedAmounts(uint256).notice: Total staked points per hypercert across all voters

voterStakes(uint256,address).notice: Per-voter stakes per hypercert: hypercertId => voter => stakedPoints

voterUsedPoints(address).notice: Total points used by each voter across all hypercerts

votingPowerRegistry().notice: Voting power registry for member eligibility checks

documentation.text: @notice Precision denominator for decay (10^7), matching ConvictionsUtils.D
@notice Conviction decay parameter (alpha * D where D = 10^7)
@notice Maximum support points per voter
@notice Voting power registry for member eligibility checks
@notice Gardens V2 registry community address
@notice Ordered array of all registered hypercert IDs
